articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Australian Dy PM Richard Marles relishes street food in Delhi, pays via UPI - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Australian Deputy Prime Minister and Defence Minister Richard Marles enjoyed drinking nimbu pani and indulged in ram laddu in Delhi.  | Trending
articles.content: Australian Deputy Prime Minister Richard Marles paid his respects to former Union Minister Arun Jaitley at the Arun Jaitley Stadium before engaging in a game of gully cricket with young players. His … [+1256 chars]
